tr.td: DEPARTMENT / SECTIONS FOR CLEARANCE (IN SEQUENTIAL ORDER)
Final Inventory (Stock / Tickets Issued / any related purchasing)
Department Keys / Store Keys / Cabinet Keys
Bed Frame (1) / Bed Mattress (1) / Bed Cover (1)
Others (Value to be deducted for unreturned Items)
Training Cost (Registered in the last one year)
Drivers (Keys, vehicles, car registration card, etc.)
Software System Login (SEVENROOMS, HRIS, FINANCE SYSTEM, ETC)
Office Locker Keys (applicable for Coporate Office Employees)
Company issued Car Parking Card / Access
Company issued Bank Account Clearance (After F/S paid)
Processing of final settlement payment will take 7 business days at the HR and Finance department after submitting this original clearance form to HR department.
